#summary How to use it
= How to use it =

Make sure that you have installed python interpreter.

Simple steps to use:
# checkout source
# cd to directory with source
# use it

*Download all seasons of [http://serials.namba.kg/serial.php?id=70 How I met your mother] to Как я встретил вашу маму/seasonNumber/*
{{{
python main.py -l http://serials.namba.kg/serial.php?id=70
}}}


*Download first and second seasons of [http://serials.namba.kg/serial.php?id=70 How I met your mother] to Как я встретил вашу маму/seasonNumber/*
{{{
python main.py -l http://serials.namba.kg/serial.php?id=70 -s 1 2
}}}



*Download first, second and third episodes of first season of [http://serials.namba.kg/serial.php?id=70 How I met your mother] to Как я встретил вашу маму/1/*
{{{
python main.py -l http://serials.namba.kg/serial.php?id=70 -s 1 -e 1 2 3
}}}
